:::{#intro}
I am a Research Scientist in the field of pharmacometrics. I am currently working as an Assistant Professor in Pharmacometrics at the Department of Experimental and Clinical Pharmacology (ECP), University of Minnesota College of Pharmacy. I am passionate about the development and implementation of innovative pharmacometric methodologies to address clinical needs for the accomplishment of precision medicine. 
:::
